item.title: I Heard What You Wrote Last Summer
item.description:
Ever been stuck in a class or meeting, diligently taking notes but unsure if you’re capturing everything accurately? Recording the session with a digital recorder alongside note-taking could help, but then syncing the audio and text becomes a nightmare. What if there was a single device that could automatically synchronize your notes and audio? Thankfully, there is! The Livescribe Pulse(tm) smartpen records audio as you write. Yes, you read that rightâ€”you write, it records...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/i-heard-what-you-wrote-last-summer/
